programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sam’s big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippet’s Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, there’s lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - they’re going to have to work together.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! programme.title: Where's Wally?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker René Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the puma’s true nature.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Since the early 1990s, Quentin Tarantino has been on a cinematic rollercoaster ride, that’s never looked like slowing down, that has cemented himself as one of the worlds most influential filmmakers.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: With over 50 years in the industry, not many filmmakers can boast the longevity and influence of Steven Spielberg, whose journey from the suburbs of Arizona to the spotlight of Hollywood is one of the greatest stories ever told.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota test outrageous remedies like leeches, head-drilling, and a pigeon that cures the plague. Also, Henry VIII’s role in Tudor medicine.

programme.title: Jaguarland
programme.desc: Explore a 400 square mile region of the Pantanal where jaguars rule and life follows the seasonal rhythm of the water.

programme.title: Growing Up Grizzly: A Tale Of Two Orphans
programme.desc: After 18 years of raising an orphaned bear named Brutus, Casey Anderson will do anything to ensure no bears have to live in a man made sanctuary. His resolve is put to the test one year when he is notified of 2 recently orphaned grizzly cubs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We find out what goes on in the training of a 'general purpose dog' and how a English Springer Spaniel has the ability to sniff out one billionth of a gram of an explosive substance.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: In Malaysia, dogs are used to sniff out illegal DVDs while in UK, dogs are trained to search a fire scene and identify flammable liquids.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: See which dogs are crowned Top Dog in different competitions in the USA, whether it is agility, stamina and obedience.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Italy's water resue dogs, New Zealand's search and rescue dogs and Australia's team of competitive Alaskan huskies.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Snow White's Revenge
programme.desc: A mystery romance with a woman who wanted to have the world and a woman who risked everything for revenge.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Everyone has a childhood favourite food, including the top chefs in the country, but some chefs are adding unique twists to these classic dishes to make them into foods adults would love.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work "The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei."

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef
programme.desc: Spring is here! So let's make some colorful spring dishes: Chef Saito's Chirashi Sushi Cake, and Crystal-clear Cherry Blossom Jelly.

programme.title: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe
programme.desc: Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Café / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Café Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampañada? / If The Boot Fits / Piñata Party
programme.desc: Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piñata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Construction Crew to the Rescue
programme.desc: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right. // Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henry's EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: Meteor Madness
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Pest Friends Forever
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sleeping Like a Baby
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye
programme.desc: After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: The Time Capsule
programme.desc: After finding Grandpa's old time capsule, Baby and William go overboard making their own.

programme.title: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake
programme.desc: It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster
programme.desc: Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: School Bus Trip
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Sleepy Princess
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: The Tree House
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Fancy Dress Party
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Fruit Surprise
programme.desc: When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: New Blue Jeans
programme.desc: Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right. // Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henry's EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: The Team Truck Challenge
programme.desc: It’s the day of the Team Truck Challenge, a race where all the trucks get to compete in teams of two! But when Crusher chooses a new partner instead of Pickle, his disappointed sidekick teams up with Blaze to prove his mettle.

programme.title: Starla's Wild West Birthday
programme.desc: Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Pups Save a Space Toy
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Al’s field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley / The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now! // When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flower-friendly construction solution.

programme.title: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride
programme.desc: After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove. // Mix dreams about giving the moon a Mix makeover. Rubble and the pups make her dream a reality with a new boardwalk ride!

programme.title: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom
programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuña who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea
programme.desc: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: A Star Fish Is Born
programme.desc: When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Sharknapped!
programme.desc: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend!

programme.title: Sharkdog Makes a Splash
programme.desc: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret.

programme.title: The Museum
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Very Hot Day
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Chloe's Puppet Show
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Daddy Gets Fit
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right. // Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henry's EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: Bbarbalalalalalala / The Biodisaster
programme.desc: Barbalala and the family life! / Barbabright and Barbabeau have designed a huge wooden toy powered by an engine using bio oil.

programme.title: One Last For The Road / The Little Critters
programme.desc: The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same... // Barbabelle had a restless night because of all the insects!

programme.title: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration
programme.desc: It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? // Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: AJ to the Rescue
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: Pups Raise the PAW Patroller / Pups Save the Crows
programme.desc: Daring Danny’s at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: Pups Save Floating Friends / Pups Save a Satellite
programme.desc: The alien’s spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship. // A satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay, the PAW patrol must fix it before it crash lands.

programme.title: Best Finemies / Dinner with Bentley
programme.desc: When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it. // The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe
programme.desc: Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Café / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Café Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampañada? / If The Boot Fits / Piñata Party
programme.desc: Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piñata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Construction Crew to the Rescue
programme.desc: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right. // Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henry's EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: Meteor Madness
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Pest Friends Forever
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sleeping Like a Baby
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye
programme.desc: After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: The Time Capsule
programme.desc: After finding Grandpa's old time capsule, Baby and William go overboard making their own.

programme.title: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake
programme.desc: It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster
programme.desc: Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta
programme.desc: Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire
programme.desc: The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Button Bonanza / Moxie the Monster
programme.desc: The hamsters are convinced Arrow is mind-controlling the family using talking buttons. // When Harry pet-sits Jocelyn's gerbil, Clover discovers it's her old nemesis, Moxie.

programme.title: The Jungle Horn
programme.desc: Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.title: The Gold Medal Games
programme.desc: It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon
programme.desc: Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Pups Get Skunked

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Bridge

programme.title: Partly Claudia / Ranita's Magic Stripes

programme.title: Unfetch

programme.title: The Mall, The Merrier
programme.desc: Two siblings, Moira (Vice Ganda) and Morissette (Anne Curtis), feud over Tamol Mall, a mall they inherited. The feud is compounded with the arrival of their Aunt Moody.
Anton and Erika have been a couple for 12 years already. While he's not yet ready to get married, Erika waits until he is and lovingly devotes her time to him.

programme.title: The Day After Valentine's
programme.desc: A woman should take the responsibility of helping a brokenhearted and self-destructive man to fix his problems.

programme.title: Exit Point
programme.desc: Because of prison overcrowding, 12 inmates were sent to an island where they must fight and survive for freedom.

programme.title: Cry No Fear
programme.desc: Kaycee (Donnalyn Bartolome) and Wendy (Ella Cruz) are always at each other's throat. But when they are left alone in their house amidst a storm, with intruders trying to kill them, they have no choice but to become partners as they try to escape.

programme.title: Mang Kepweng Returns
programme.desc: When Mang Kepweng died because of mysterious circumstances, he buried with him a secret--aside from his son Zacharias (James Blanco), he had another son named Kiefer (Vhong Navarro.) Kiefer is the heir to the magical bandana that possesses the power to heal any kind of illness.

programme.title: Honey, Nasa Langit Na Ba Ako?
programme.desc: They are looking forward to spend a lifetime together, a lifetime of blissful marriage and a lifetime full of love. But their romance tale is not meant to have a happy ending.

programme.title: Ang Erpat Kong Astig
programme.desc: At a relatively young age, Joe Cuartero (JinggoyEstrada) is already a widower. With his wife gone, Joe’s life is now centered on his young daughter Tweety (Bea Bueno).

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Maid in London
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, a young mother, Margo (Andi Eigenmann) and her best friend, Faye (Alexis Navarro) are forced to cling to the edge of a knife so they could travel in the United Kingdom.

programme.title: Kainan Sa Highway
programme.desc: Kainan sa Highway is a story of survival, addiction for flesh and struggling for life.

programme.title: Room 213
programme.desc: The story follows the endangered relationship of an architect and his wife, a photographer. After being married for 10 years, they have lost all emotional connections with each other.

programme.title: Ang Pahina
programme.desc: Because of Mira’s (Kiray Celis) determination to convinced her loved one study, she, together with her mother Linda, Mang Johnny and Paul all have graduated with flying colors with the help of DepEd’s Alternative Learning System.

programme.title: Kusina
programme.desc: "Kusina" is the silent witness to the life and love of Juanita. It is her sanctuary, the place where she creates dishes for her family, her friends, even enemies and strangers. Through cooking, she gets to know the people around her, and in return, reveal herself to them.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Scorpion King: Book Of Souls
programme.desc: When an evil warlord (Peter Mensah) discovers a sword that can steal souls, the Scorpion King (Zach McGowan) must find the one thing that can defeat him: the Book of Souls.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: The world's foremost authority on structural security accepts a job to break out of an ultra-secret, high-tech facility. When he agrees, he is incarcerated in the most secret and secure prison on the planet—and no one knows it is just a test.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 4: Quest For Power
programme.desc: Set in ancient Eastern Europe, legendary warrior Mathayus is betrayed by his pupil. In a race against time, Mathayus must defeat this adversary in time to find a treasure holding the powerto rule the world.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must switch identities to track down a heroin thief and save their department.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of friends break into the house of a wealthy blind man, thinking they'll get away with the perfect heist. They're wrong.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 4: Quest For Power
programme.desc: Set in ancient Eastern Europe, legendary warrior Mathayus is betrayed by his pupil. In a race against time, Mathayus must defeat this adversary in time to find a treasure holding the powerto rule the world.

programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original: Ryan, Ed, Cez, Kai and Joy. They play hide-and-seek and tell scary stories. On their last Fright Night before graduation, they are joined by Franco, a classmate whom they barely know but has always been envious of the group of friends. On this last Fright Night, Franco is It. It will also be the last time they will ever see Franco again.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but she mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumor has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears...

However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Blue Green Ghost
programme.desc: Based on a popular video game of the same name, six high school students are trapped in an abandoned haunted house where they are being pursued by an enigmatic blue Oni (Blue Green Ghost). After a series of terrifying incidents, are they able find a way out and finally escape from the haunted house?

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Habitants Du Nord
programme.desc: Nadia and Vincent have finally arrived in Tuktoyaktuk. In the company of Michèle and Bruce, they discover the lifestyle of the inhabitants. The traditions are strong but will they survive now that Dempster Highway links this community to the rest of Canada?

programme.title: Les Images De Mademoiselle Devos
programme.desc: Flanders, 1922. Suffering from tuberculosis, the young Jeanne Devos is sent to live with an enlightened priest. Twenty years later she becomes the first professional photographer in the Nord. Recounting everyday life at the time, her pictures reveal the keen eye of an iconoclast whose work remains little known.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: À Travers Champs
programme.desc: According to specialists on the issue, 50% of farmers suffer from psychological distress. It's a profession with high levels of stress and huge responsibilities, which are often assumed alone or as a couple.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Habitants Du Nord
programme.desc: Nadia and Vincent have finally arrived in Tuktoyaktuk. In the company of Michèle and Bruce, they discover the lifestyle of the inhabitants. The traditions are strong but will they survive now that Dempster Highway links this community to the rest of Canada?

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix is excited about the idea of getting back to her friends in the land of the Wonderfolk. Unfortunately for her, Big Boss has set them to work on an endless list of jobs.

programme.title: À Travers Champs
programme.desc: According to specialists on the issue, 50% of farmers suffer from psychological distress. It's a profession with high levels of stress and huge responsibilities, which are often assumed alone or as a couple.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Établi
programme.desc: 1968. Robert, graduated from École Normale Supérieur and extreme left militant, is hired by Citroën as assembly line worker to revive the revolutionary fire. When the company requires workers to work three hours overtime per week for no pay, Robert and some others see the opportunity for a social movement.

programme.title: Le Coffre
programme.desc: A deserted carpark, strange sounds coming from the boot of a car. Will Sébastien open the boot? Yes. That is, until his mother gets involved...

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: A young woman wakes up in hospital after a car accident. Completely amnesiac, she has forgotten everything, including her identity, but the police recognise Marina Masson, a girl kidnapped eleven years ago. Her parents, now separated, hurry to her. Then the body of the suspected kidnapper, Ivan Claes, is found.

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: Marina secretly meets someone called Maël, with whom she's planning to run away. As Laurent Masson, Marina's father, becomes closer to Hélène, his ex-wife, and their children, an identity card in the name of Alexandra Martinez is found in the jacket Marina had lost. Is she an imposter?

programme.title: Meurtres Aux Îles De Lérins
programme.desc: A corpse is found on the Lérins Islands. The victim was taking part in making a film adapted from the story about the Iron Mask. The investigation strangely echoes the legend of the historical figure and the different identities that have been ascribed to him.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Maurice Chevalier, Un Canotier À Hollywood
programme.desc: A legendary French singer and also an actor, dancer and comic, Maurice Chevalier (1888-1972) became a Hollywood star through films of Ernst Lubitsch, Billy Wilder and Vincente Minnelli, his Ménilmontant accent and famous straw hat perfectly capturing the spirit of French irreverence. This is his portrait.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: When Hee-Joo was 7 years old, her father was murdered. The killer, Ki-Bum, was eventually arrested. Hee-Joo has waited patiently for Ki-Bum's release.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the "House of Horrors".

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep1
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep2
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: The Devil's Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: Love My Scent
programme.desc: An ordinary man who has never known love, struggles to talk to his crush who goes to work on the same bus as him every day. Things started to change when he acquires a strange perfume that has the power to attract women...

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Jihye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker who has a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: Good Day
programme.desc: As a project proposed by G-DRAGON himself, the highly anticipated variety show <Good Day> presents the process of producer G-DRAGON collaborating with different artists to create the song of the year.

programme.desc: The best chefs from <Culinary Class Wars> go head-to-head to create impromptu dishes that feature ingredients found inside the guest stars' very own refrigerators.

programme.title: The World of the Married
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo, a successful doctor, is married to Lee Tae-oh, an aspiring filmmaker. Their marriage, however, starts to fall apart when Lee engages in an extra-marital affair.

programme.title: Flower of Evil
programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.

programme.title: Init Sa Magdamag (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a modern tale about woman. Her many moods. Her many faces. No matter who she was, happiness was not destined to be hers as all the events of her past eventually caught up with her.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: Humanda Ka… Ikaw Ang Susunod
programme.desc: Humanda Ka… Ikaw Ang Susunod

programme.title: Pinagbiyak Na Bunga (Lookalayk)
programme.desc: Watching Andrew E and Chiquito together as they play the parts of con-men who might indeed be father and son.

programme.title: Ex-Rebel
programme.desc: Concerned with his pregnant wife Saling, rebel leader Ka Leon decides to take advantage of the government's amnesty program to rejoin society. But Ka Leon's past catches up with him.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Kung Aagawin Mo Ang Lahat Sa Akin
programme.desc: An intense rivalry has always existed between Jackie Lou and her older sister, Sharon, whom her parents had adopted before she was born. Their father believed the girls should be treated as equals but their mother, thought otherwise.

programme.title: Heartache City
programme.desc: Heartache City

programme.title: Paikot-Ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Segurista
programme.desc: Made destitute by the eruption of Mount Pinatubo in Central Luzon, Karen decides to work as an insurance underwriter by day and as a guest relation’s officer in a club by night.

programme.title: Sobra-Sobra, Labis-Labis
programme.desc: Pinay, a young and fragile lass whose vulnerability was exploited by her stepfather who was ne'er-do-well scattergood while Tisay, a perceptive flesh vending streetsmart whose openness to things around her made her an interesting character study for a new-sprung writer.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: A failed romance in the past between her mother and his father threatened the budding relationship between Sharon and Gabby, in this film, which was the very first movie produced by Viva Films.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 08
programme.desc: While Riggs & Murtaugh investigate the underground mob world, Riggs spends time with his childhood friend, Molly (KRISTEN GUTOSKIE), and Roger feuds with his neighbor.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 4
programme.desc: The Kents struggle to adjust to their new normal. Lois helps throw Kyle and Chrissy an impromptu wedding that doesn’t quite go as planned.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 11
programme.desc: Michael feeds a cannibalistic plant at a garden center, and at the tuxedo store, he sells a tie that literally suits itself. Plus, at a hockey rink, Michael's assistant is speechless with a trick so electric it melts the ice!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 12
programme.desc: Michael sweetens a woman's day at a candy store when a chocolate bunny eats her ring, and at the stadium for the Chicago White Sox, he inflates pretzels at a snack stand. Plus, one of Michael's tricks gets flushed down the tubes.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 1
programme.desc: As he juggles family time and his next film project, Hollywood mega-star Mark Wahlberg focuses on a new role in his expansive resume - budding business mogul.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 2
programme.desc: Mark tackles unanticipated problems in his startups but sees a return on investment in one of his newest businesses.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 16
programme.desc: An item in one bin has Papa Bear and Mone revving their engines, while T Money gambles on guns being hidden in another bin. Team Brandori bids up the auctions, infuriating the others to the point of retaliation. But who will get the last laugh?
